changeSet.author: pegah
changeSet.sql: UPDATE field_settings SET deleted = 1 WHERE field_settings_id <> 0 AND field_settings_id IN ( SELECT field_settings_id FROM (SELECT * FROM field_settings ) as temp WHERE column_name = 'D_TGA_OS_SPECIFY' AND field_type = 'CONOTRUNCAL_GROUP' AND ddp_instance_id in (SELECT ddp_instance_id FROM ddp_instance WHERE instance_name = "singular"));

UPDATE field_settings SET actions = '[{"type":"conditionalDisplay","condition":"true","conditionalFieldSetting":{"columnName":"D_TGA_OS_SPECIFY","fieldType":"CONOTRUNCAL_GROUP","columnDisplay":"Specify (d-TGA os)","displayType":"TEXTAREA"}}]' WHERE field_settings_id <> 0 AND field_settings_id IN ( SELECT field_settings_id FROM (SELECT * FROM field_settings ) as tmp WHERE column_name = 'D_TGA_OS' AND field_type = 'CONOTRUNCAL_GROUP' AND ddp_instance_id in (SELECT ddp_instance_id FROM ddp_instance WHERE instance_name = "singular"));
